TopicTitle: Mission Builder: Kerbal EVA node broken?

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to detect when a Kerbal leaves a vessel, and the only node that does anything like that is "Kerbal EVA". But it never activates, whether the vessel is landed or the rocket is in orbit. I have never been able to get it to activate.

Considering it has the exact same options as "Kerbal Boarded" and is in the same category, logic dictates that it's the counterpart to "Kerbal Boarded", but it doesn't ever activate.

 

EDIT: Alright, I found the culprit. If you don't set "Vessel" to "Any", it doesn't work.
